column4: hi i want to install a rpm files but taking this error on ssh http://paste.ubuntu.com/881324/ can any body help me about this
rpm is not ubuntu's packaging system. you'll probably have lots of problems with it

installing anything with rpm on ubuntu will not work. get it through apt
